content.text:
<image 1> This work draws inspiration from works like

A. the Great Stupa at Sanchi
B. the Serpent Mound in Ohio
C. Machu Picchu in Peru
D. the ruins of the city of Pompeii

B. the Serpent Mound in Ohio

The image depicts a large spiral structure made of rocks, which is reminiscent of the Serpent Mound in Ohio. This ancient earthwork is a large, prehistoric, serpentine effigy mound located in Adams County, Ohio, United States. It is one of the largest prehistoric earthenworks in the world and is believed to have been created by the Adena culture around 1000 BCE.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
